description: As always, PM Narendra Modi looks forward to sharing his thoughts on themes and issues that matter to you. The Prime Minister invites you to share your ideas on topics he should address on the 30th Episode of Mann Ki Baat. Send us your suggestions on the themes or issues you want the Prime Minister…
caption: mygov.in
message:
This month’s #MannKiBaat will be held on Sunday 26th March. Share your ideas on the MyGov Open Forum.  You can call on 1800-11-7800  to record your message for #MannKiBaat. Your thoughts & ideas are always enriching.

You can also share your ideas on the MyGov Open Forum. https://www.mygov.in/group-issue/share-your-ideas-pm-narendra-modis-mann-ki-baat-26th-march-2017/
